devdoc.author: Tim Pechersky (@Peersky)
devdoc.details: This allows to query contracts by their bytecode instead of addresses.

get(bytes32).details: returns zero if the contract is not indexed

register(address).details: `msg.codeHash` will be usedIt will revert if the contract is already indexed

devdoc.title: Byte Code Indexer Contract

get(bytes32).notice: Returns the contract address by its bytecode hash

register(address).notice: Registers a contract in the index by its bytecode hash

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract to index contracts by their bytecode.
